title: What really makes PNE HOMES
subtitle: great is our committed and professional staff
description: We're excited to introduce the great people who are at the heart of our business and do their best to make your experience at PNE homes the best it can be. Scroll down to get to know them.

team.name: Anastasio Alammar
team.description: Anastasio Alammar serves as the President of PNE HOMES, bringing a wealth of experience and expertise to his role.

team.name: Amin Rababah
team.description: Amin Rababah is the President of Construction at PNE HOMES, with a strong engineering background and extensive experience in construction.

team.name: Jason Lawrence
team.description: Jason Lawrence is an esteemed Executive Advisor and President of marketing at PNE HOMES, bringing a wealth of experience and expertise to his role.

team.name: Kholoud Alzilaa
team.description: Kholoud Alzilaa is an accomplished and creative professional, serving as the Head of Design at PNE HOMES. With extensive experience in interior design and custom home building design.

team.name: Ayham Alammar
team.description: Ayham Alammar, the Director of Customer Relations at PNE HOMES, brings a wealth of expertise in customer service and entrepreneurship to his role.

team.name: Theologos Sakellaris
team.description: Theologos Sakellaris serves as the Director of Customer Acquisition at PNE HOMES, bringing extensive experience in customer service and entrepreneurship to his role.

contact.title: Contact Us Today
contact.message: We'd love to hear from you! Whether you have questions, feedback, or simply want to say hello, we're here to help. Please don't hesitate to reach out to us. We value your input and look forward to connecting with you.
